name: ListTeamMemberWages
description:
Retrieve paginated team member wages for a business.

Use this tool to obtain a paginated list of wages for team members within a business. Ideal for managing payroll and financial records.

parameters.name: filter_by_team_member_id
parameters.description: Filter wages by specifying the team member's ID. Only wages for this team member will be returned.

value_schema.description:
Filter the returned wages to only those that are associated with the
specified team member.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of team member wages to return per page, ranging from 1 to 200. Default is 200.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of `TeamMemberWage` results to return per page. The number can range between
1 and 200. The default is 200.

parameters.name: next_page_cursor
parameters.description: A token used to fetch the next page of team member wage results.

value_schema.description: A pointer to the next page of `EmployeeWage` results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: team_member_id
parameters.description:
Filter the returned wages to only those that are associated with the
specified team member.

value_schema.description:
Filter the returned wages to only those that are associated with the
specified team member.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
The maximum number of `TeamMemberWage` results to return per page. The number can range between
1 and 200. The default is 200.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of `TeamMemberWage` results to return per page. The number can range between
1 and 200. The default is 200.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pointer to the next page of `EmployeeWage` results to fetch.

value_schema.description: A pointer to the next page of `EmployeeWage` results to fetch.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
